lead_paragraph: Baltimore Ravens kickoff returner B. J. Sams, whose 30.9-yard-a-return average ranks second in the N.F.L., was charged with driving under the influence, his second D.U.I. arrest in 14 months. Sams was stopped shortly before 2 a.m. Tuesday on the Baltimore Beltway, the police said. A second violation of the league’s substance-abuse policy could result in a four-game suspension.
